snippet: Closer Frank Francisco was all smiles Thursday after the Mets' victory over the Reds, but his pitching since his return from injury has not stabilized the Mets' shaky bullpen.
abstract: Closer Frank Francisco was all smiles Thursday after the Mets' victory over the Reds, but his pitching since his return from injury has not stabilized the Mets' shaky bullpen.

headline.main: Behind Francisco's Grin: Less Than Lovely Numbers
